name: Windows Installation Checklist
3. INSPECT SITE
3.1 Work area is clean / clear & substrate is acceptable.
3.2 Site measure opening sizes are correct & plumb.
3.3 Rebates & waterproofing membrane is in place.
3.4 Sarking is in place, taped & fully returned into opening.
4. INSPECT PRODUCT
4.1 Doors & Windows received in good condition.
4.2 Windows allocated to correct locations per IFC shop drawings.
5. INSTALL SUBHEADS, SUBSILLS, SUBJAMBS & SHROUDS:
5.1 Shroud sealed to subhead & subjamb correctly prior to install. (Photo Required)
5.2 Subsill located correctly off grid, relative to building & per IFC shop drawings.
5.3 Subsill installed with U-shaped 3 sided sealant. (Photo Required)
5.4 Subsill fitted with stopends, level, fully sealed & fixings sealed. (Photo Required)
5.5 Subsill water test of a 20% sampling. (Photo required)
5.6 Subhead & subjambs plumb / level, fully sealed & fixings sealed. (Photo Required)
6. INSTALL PERIMETER WEATHER SEAL:
6.1 External & internal 7 sided caulking. (Photo Required)
7. INSTALL & PROTECT WINDOW FRAMES & DOORS:
7.1 Remove all non-accessible protection tape & film. Trade clean glass.
7.2 Frames & doors installed plumb & correct height.
7.3 Windows open / close freely & latching correctly.
7.4 All infills fitted & hardware installed correctly. (Photo Required)
7.5 Sliding door panels secured with fixing kits & height-adjusted to 10mm cover. (Photo Required)
7.6 Protection tape & film to accessible areas. Work area clean. (Photo Required)
8. FINAL ADJUSTMENTS & INSPECTION:
8.1 Correct function of chainwinders, locks, latches hardware, closers etc.
8.2 All thresholds & fillers installed correctly.
8.3 All winder limiters do not exceed 125mm.
8.4 All fly screens installed correctly.
8.5 FINAL CHECK! Window / door is complete & without visible defect. Work area is clean. (Photo Required)
